info.author: Huang Peng
info.description:
It's a python binding for SCIM. SCIM is a smart common input platform. With
scim-python, developer can develop input methods using python language.
Currently, this project includes Chinese PinYin input method and English input
method.
info.keywords: scim, IM, input method, X11, Pinyin,
info.name: scim-python
info.html_description: It’s a python binding for SCIM. SCIM is a smart common input platform. With scim-python, developer can develop input methods using python language. Currently, this project includes Chinese PinYin input method and English input method.
